sentences.en: Goudriaan, a postdoctoral researcher at the Uniersity of Amsterdam and corresponding author for the study.
sentences.cn: Goudriaan说,她是阿姆斯特丹大学的博士后研究员, 也是该项研究的通讯作者.

sentences.en: Hasan Eker asks about getting a post - doctoral postdoctoral position in the United States.
sentences.cn: 这个职位通常提供给获得哲学博士学位的人.

sentences.en: I'm doing postdoctoral research at the moment.
In the personnel that flow stands or job of postdoctoral scientific research pursues in workstation.
sentences.cn: 在流动站或工作站里从事博士后科研工作的人员.

sentences.en: Many companies invested in establishing postdoctoral research center.
sentences.cn: 很多公司投资建立博士后研究中心.

sentences.en: Most postdoctoral work is funded by the research councils.
sentences.cn: 大部分的博士后的工作都是由研究会资助的。

sentences.en: Postdoctoral Research Fellow with the MUSCLE Internal Fellowship from European Research Consortium for Informatics and Mathematics.
sentences.cn: 博士后研究员,获欧洲信息学与数学研究联盟MUSCLE博士后奖学金.

sentences.en: Project supported by the Shanghai Postdoctoral Sustentation Fund, China ( Grant No. ).
sentences.cn: 上海市 博士后 基金资助的课题.

sentences.en: September 1995 - September 1997 , Postdoctoral Research Fellow , School of Electrical and Electronic Engineering, Nanyang Technological University, Singapore.
sentences.cn: 1995年9月----1997年9月,博士后,电器电子工程系, 南洋理工大学, 新加坡.

sentences.en: Since the 1970 s, it has begun enrolling postgraduates Masterand doctoral and established the postdoctoral station.
sentences.cn: 自70年代开始招收硕士、博士研究生、并设有博士后流动站.

sentences.en: The main task for postdoctoral fellow is to investigate mechanism of metastasis of prostatecancer.
sentences.cn: 主要研究前列腺癌转移的发生机制.

sentences.en: There are 7 undergraduate, 10 graduate and 2 doctoral specialties and 1 postdoctoral mobile research station.
sentences.cn: 设有7个本科专业 、 10个硕士点、2个博士点和1个博士后流动站.

trans.tran_en: A postdoctoral student has completed his or her doctorate and is doing further study or research
